unnormalised: **Gas Cylinder Prices: Ouch! Another Hike Before Diwali?**
normalised: Gas Cylinder Prices: Ouch! Another Hike Before Diwali?

unnormalised: Delhi - Hold on to your wallets, folks! Looks like cooking gas prices are on the rise again. Just in time for Diwali, too! Seems like the govt. might be planning another hike, and people are already feeling the pinch.
normalised: Delhi - Hold on to your wallets, folks! Looks like cooking gas prices are on the rise again. Just in time for Diwali, too! Seems like the government. might be planning another hike, and people are already feeling the pinch.

unnormalised: Remember how last month a cylinder cost Rs. 1100? Well, whispers from the Petroleum Ministry suggest it could jump by another Rs. 50-100 soon. That's going to make that festive biryani a whole lot more expensive to cook, isn't it?
normalised: Remember how last month a cylinder cost rupee one thousand one hundred? Well, whispers from the Petroleum Ministry suggest it could jump by another rupee fifty to one hundred soon. That's going to make that festive biryani a whole lot more expensive to cook, isn't it?

unnormalised: "It's getting ridiculous," says Lakshmi from Lajpat Nagar, "How are we supposed to manage our household budgets with these constant increases?"
normalised: "It's getting ridiculous," says Lakshmi from Lajpat Nagar, "How are we supposed to manage our household budgets with these constant increases?"

unnormalised: Analysts at ICICI Securities predict global crude oil prices are to blame, but honestly, that doesn't help the common man much.
normalised: Analysts at I C I C I Securities predict global crude oil prices are to blame, but honestly, that doesn't help the common man much.

unnormalised: Rumours are flying that a subsidy rejig might be in the works, but details are scarce. Will Chhath Puja celebrations be fuelled by even pricier gas? Only time will tell. Stay tuned for updates!
normalised: Rumours are flying that a subsidy rejig might be in the works, but details are scarce. Will Chhath Puja celebrations be fuelled by even pricier gas? Only time will tell. Stay tuned for updates!
